channel.title: VBRc on Chris Havlin
channel.description: Recent content in VBRc on Chris Havlin

item.title: Specifying unrelaxed moduli in the VBRc (version 1.1+)
item.description: The most recent feature release of the VBRc (version 1.1) included some changes that simplify the specification of the unrelaxed moduli used within the VBRc.
